Action.author: c0rwin
Action.body: Error: Error endorsing chaincode: rpc error: code = Unknown desc = could not get msp for chain ch1 indicates peer has not been joined to the chain. I'd suspected that you missed ordering service in join command: > peer channel join -b ch1.block should be ``` peer channel join -b ch1.block -o 127.0.0.1:7050 ``` >

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~zhaochong closing this as this based on Beta. Can you try latest and reopen if the problem exists please ?
